Description:
The Ideal Family Home - In a great Location!
Combining comfort and convenience, this spacious family home is packed with potential! Everything is covered, from the sought-after location to the expansive yard and bright rooms, it's all here. All you need to do is move straight in!
From the moment you enter this neat, single-storey residence, you'll be impressed by the functional layout and clever use of space. The large living/dining area will immediately capture your attention with its huge windows that perfectly illuminate the room. Set on a 448m2 block, there's ample outside space to enjoy and explore.
Features Include
- 4 Spacious Bedrooms all with Built In Robes
- Master Bedroom with Ensuite
- Stainless Steel Appliances in Kitchen
- 90mm Gas Cooktop
- Central Bathroom
- Ducted Heating
- Double Garage
- Outdoor Decking
- Close to Schools, Shops, Parks, Bus Transport
If you love entertaining and want an easy to move into home that's been cherished for years, then this is the home for you.

Description:
Relax, Entertain & Enjoy!
From the moment you step inside you will be impressed with the quality & style that this family home has to offer. With a vibrant, charismatic personality & cleverly designed home which delivers easy, practical & flexible living for all.
Beyond its striking facade, the home's beautifully-appointed interior boasts a large master bedroom fitted with walk in robe and ensuite, three additional large bedrooms, stunning main bathroom and the perfect family room.
Other luxuries include kitchen with stainless 900mm steel appliances plus dishwasher, oversized dining room, ducted heating, evaporative cooling, quality light fittings, double car garage with internal access, immaculately landscaped front and rear gardens plus alfresco area.
An aspirational family lifestyle located in one of Craigieburn's most popular estates & premium streets amongst quality homes & parkland. With all amenities close by including Craigieburn Central, Stockland shopping centre, public transport and local schools. This home really is the complete package, be quick to inspect as it won't hang around for long!

Description:
Bargain Basement Buying on 512 SQM
This premium block lends itself easily to many home designs allowing you the perfect opportunity to build your dream home.
- Titled land of 512m² ready to build
- Wide frontage of 16m & 32m depth
- Perfect rectangular dimensions
- Fully fenced either side
Location:-
- Merrifield Shopping Centre featuring Coles opening next year!
- Kool Kidz Childcare & kindergarten already open
- 2 parks already open with another opening in 2020
- Social community programs including a monthly market, sport & fitness groups & community events
- Resident exclusive bus servicing nearby shopping centres, schools & public transport
- State primary school opening 2021
- A Community hub featuring child & health services & multipurpose activity spaces opening 2021
- Primary school opening 2023
- Walking distance to child care, BP fuel station & convenience store.
Priced to please, call now to avoid disappointment.

Description:
Elegance and Inviting ambience
It is our pleasure to present this luxury home, featuring 4 bedrooms, 2 bathrooms, 1 car garage, and much more of outstanding designer features.
With a modern welcoming exterior facade, and an easy to maintain landscaped garden, settled in Annandale Estate this exceptional family home is thoughtfully constructed with every need in mind.
From the stylish entry that feels you with a sense of generous space, you will walk into the opulent master suite with its huge dressing room style walk-in robe area, a lavish en-suite with a crisp white free-standing luxury hot tub.
Displaying a sophisticated and elegantly designed kitchen ideal for entertaining, featured with 900mm S/S appliances, a wide marble island bench top, an eye-catching pendant light fixture over the island bench illuminating the heart of this home and adding a subtle ambience for your extra comfort.
The Open plan living and dining room for everyone to enjoy is bright with plenty of natural daylight, windows draped in a modern discreet furnishing that provides cool yet casual relaxed living.
The three spacious bedrooms all of which feature mirrored built-in-robes, timber floating boards giving you the overall crisp and fresh feeling.
A large family bathroom with a large Roman Bath conveniently serves the remaining three bedrooms, built with stone benches, floor to ceiling wall tiles and modern basin cabinetry.
The cosy decked outdoor alfresco, leads you to the back yard and side of house, delivering the perfect serenity for private relaxation.
There are so many reasons to make this house your dream home, and the following just adds to the luxury features offered - Refrigerated Cooling and ducted heating, downlights throughout the home, touch digital switches, bulk head with fibre optic light, alarm system, Smart Intercom, painted concrete garage floor, aggregate concrete driveway, 2.7 height ceilings throughout, modern tall Doors throughout, soft closing Kitchen cabinets, laundry with overhead cabinets, Large porcelain tiles, and much more
Due diligence checklist - for home and residential property buyers -
http://www.consumer.vic.gov.au/duediligencechecklist

Description:
35 Squares of Luxury & Style!
A generous blend of living and entertaining options plus quality inclusions that cater superbly for today's lifestyle expectations create a highly desirable living environment and a home of distinction. Located in Roxburgh Park "Arena Estate" with close proximity schools, shops and public transport. This impressive family home offers space, style & luxury with its free flowing floor plan comprising of a grand entrance with 3 metre high ceiling, formal lounge/ theatre room, large kitchen with stone bench tops and walk-in pantry overlooking a large family and meals area with an access to a huge outdoor entertainment area and plenty of room for the growing family to enjoy, 4 good size bedrooms (master with full ensuite and all with WIR's), separate study, central bathroom, spacious Laundry, double garage with remote and internal access.
Fixtures and fittings including: ducted heating, refrigerated cooling, alarm system, visual intercom, gas fireplace, blinds vacuum system, dishwasher, stainless steel appliances, second outdoor kitchen and much more.
*Harcourts Roxburgh Park Coronavirus Update*
In light of recent events, Harcourts Roxburgh Park have taken the appropriate measures to minimise the risk of the coronavirus (COVID-19) outbreak to our staff, clients and customers. As news concerning the spread of coronavirus continues to unfold, we are no longer conducting open for inspections and kindly ask that you DO NOT attend inspections, if:
* You are feeling unwell
* Have been in contact with someone diagnosed with coronavirus
* Have been in contact with someone who has recently been overseas
* You are under strict self-isolation instructions
* You have tested positive to coronavirus yourself
If attending inspections, please ensure you practice Social Distancing (minimum 1.5 metres) at all times, keeping in mind:
* Our agents will restrict the number of people inspecting the property to one person at any time.
* You refrain from touching surfaces, door handles, cupboards, drawers, walls, etc. when inspecting the property.
We appreciate your co-operation and ask that you please respect the advice and recommendations of the agent when inspecting the property.

Description:
Calling All First Home Buyers & Investors!!
If you're looking for that first home or keen on adding to your investment portfolio, then this is the way to go. Situated right in the heart of Craigieburn, this home comprises of 2 large bedrooms upstairs, as well as a main bathroom and study nook. Downstairs you will find a roomy living and meals area and a well-appointed kitchen offering stainless steel appliances, stone bench tops and dishwasher. Step outside and you will find a fantastic, low maintenance backyard, complete with decking and an alfresco with built in bench seating creating the perfecting environment for entertaining all year round. Other features include split system heating/cooling, rear access car accommodation for 2 cars, and much much more. This property will not disappoint, Inspection is a must!!

Description:
Value-Packed, Warm & Welcoming!
In a blissfully quiet location, this feature-packed home delivers a ready-to-enjoy lifestyle with its versatile floorplan, quality inclusions & outdoor entertaining space. Its immaculate light-filled interior showcases a conveniently located guest bedroom downstairs/ optional study, 3 huge bedrooms upstairs (master with ensuite & walk-in robe) & sparkling central bathroom
A deceivingly spacious 25 square (approx) layout includes formal lounge/dining, gourmet kitchen with ample cupboard & bench space, vast open plan living zone bathed in natural light, flowing seamlessly through to a tranquil landscaped rear garden & decked pergola area.
Many additional features include; high ceilings, ducted heating, evaporative cooling, roomy laundry, downstairs powder room, 3 toilets, double remote garage with internal access & the bonus of NO Strata fees!
Conveniently located directly opposite nature surrounds, Roxburgh Rise Primary School & vast open spaces, it also is within walking distance to public transport, local shops & right in-between Craigieburn & Roxburgh Park.
INSPECTIONS ARE A MUST!

Description:
Modern Family Perfection with Every Indulgence
Intelligently designed, beautifully appointed & bathed in natural light, this as-new residence 4 bedroom delivers a family lifestyle beyond compare along with quick & easy access to the best of Highlands.
High square-set ceilings throughout, the home's vogue interior comprises an extra-large master bedroom with fitted walk-in robe & luxurious ensuite with double vanity & double shower, together with 3 additional bedrooms (built-in robes) & stylish main bathroom.
Complementing the vast & versatile open-plan living/dining area is a gourmet kitchen with
stone benchtops & splashbacks, dishwasher, 900mm cooking appliances & adjoining butler's pantry.
Other first-class features include zoned ducted heating & refrigerated cooling, alarm & video intercom, large laundry with ample cupboard space, on-trend black fittings, soft-close cabinetry & double blinds throughout. Stacker doors reveal an al-fresco entertaining area & neat gardens all-round, plus the added advantage of a remote-control double garage with internal entry.
Close proximity to Craigieburn's growing array of primary & secondary schools, popular parks & shopping centres along with easy access to Mickleham Road & the Hume Freeway.

Description:
Modern & Spacious Family Entertainer - $10,000 FHOG for eligible buyers!!
(PLEASE USE APPLE IPHONE MAPS OR WWW.WHEREIS.COM TO FIND THE ADDRESS OR CALL AGENTS FOR DIRECTION)
Ticks all the buyer's wish list!!
1. Land size - 392 sqm
2. House size - 25 sq approx
3. 4 Bedrooms, 2 Living Area, 2 Bathrooms & double garage
4. Walking to distance to Botancial Future Shopping Centre
5. Approx 12 mins drive to Craigieburn Central shopping centre
6. Approx 13 mins drive to Donnybrook Train station
7. Approx 20 mins drive to Melbourne Airport
8. Just 29 km to CBD
9. Plus, if you're a first home buyer, you may be eligible for the $10,000 FHOG!!
Only 5% to secure the property and balance on settlement!!
9 Peanut Avenue Mickleham in the prestigious Botanical Estate is a modern contemporary and brand new home ready to move in by May 2020!
9 Peanut Ave offers:
- 4 Bedroom, master with ensuite and his & her walk in robes, 3 Bedrooms with built in robe serviced by central bathroom
- Modern open plan kitchen with walk in pantry
- Open plan living area
- Rumpus Room
- 20mm Stone Benchtop
- 900mm Stainless Steel Cooktop and range-hood
- 600 mm dishwasher
- High ceiling 2590mm
- Remote controlled double garage & much more!!
Contact Mike on 0430 126 491 or Frank on 0426 425 361 for further details and to register your interest.

Description:
Pure Serenity Lifestyle On 5.63 Acres
A privileged, rare & exciting opportunity to build the dream home or utilise the planning permit (Subject to council conditions) and divide the block into two 2.82Acre (approx) lots on this wonderful Mickleham property tucked away in a quiet court.
Situated on approximately 5.63 acres (approx) whatever your requirements may be this property offers endless possibilities, only a short drive out of Melbourne's CBD, within close proximity to Hume Anglican Grammar and neighbouring Craigieburn's facilities such as a metropolitan railway line, sporting clubs, shopping facilities including Craigieburn Central, Highlands shopping, hotel & bistro, schools, parkland and much more.
This is a fantastic opportunity to enjoy the best of both worlds, a peaceful country lifestyle and yet only approximately 30 kilometres from the city, let the kids run free in the safety of your own private space, capturing scenic views and a lifestyle that must be inspected to be fully appreciated.
**Note**
There is currently a notice of decision from Hume City Council to grant a planning permit (Subject to conditions) in order to subdivide this block.
For more information please contact Omar Morsi on 0432 418 089 or omorsi@barryplant.com.au

Description:
Great Family Home!
Located in the heart of Roxburgh Park with close proximity to schools, local shops and public transport. This magnificent double storey home offers space and convenient for the growing family to enjoy!
Comprises of two separate living zones including formal lounge & dining, good size kitchen overlooking the open plan living and dining area with access to the huge outdoor entertainment area, 4 good size bedrooms (master with full ensuite), separate study/ 5th bedrooms, retreat area upstairs, central bathroom, three toilets, separate laundry, side driveway leading to a double garage.
Other features included: ducted heating, 5xsplit systems, solar panels, alarm system, kitchen appliances, vertical blinds, garden shed and much more.
*Harcourts Roxburgh Park Coronavirus Update*
In light of recent events, Harcourts Roxburgh Park have taken the appropriate measures to minimise the risk of the coronavirus (COVID-19) outbreak to our staff, clients and customers. As news concerning the spread of coronavirus continues to unfold, we are no longer conducting open for inspections and kindly ask that you DO NOT attend inspections, if:
* You are feeling unwell
* Have been in contact with someone diagnosed with coronavirus
* Have been in contact with someone who has recently been overseas
* You are under strict self-isolation instructions
* You have tested positive to coronavirus yourself
If attending inspections, please ensure you practice Social Distancing (minimum 1.5 metres) at all times, keeping in mind:
* Our agents will restrict the number of people inspecting the property to one person at any time.
* You refrain from touching surfaces, door handles, cupboards, drawers, walls, etc. when inspecting the property.
We appreciate your co-operation and ask that you please respect the advice and recommendations of the agent when inspecting the property.

Description:
Instantly Appealing in a Prized Location
Be quick to inspect this beautifully presented home offering gorgeous street appeal and quality interior features with an abundance of natural light & character for all home buyers and investors alike. Offering 3 bedrooms, fully equipped kitchen with stainless steel appliances, main bathroom, master bedroom with walk in robe and ensuite, open plan meals area with adjoining family room.

Ideally located in one of Craigieburn's most popular estates (Aston) & tightly held streets amongst quality homes & parkland. With all the amenities close by including a short stroll to Highlands Lake, Aitken Creek, Craigieburn Central shopping centre, schools, local shops, public transport & child care facilities, be quick to inspect as this one won't hang around for long!

Description:
BEST ON SHOW!
Even better than brand-new, this single-level showpiece delivers the on-trend appeal of a just-completed home along with all the added extras that will make living an absolute breeze!
Impeccably presented from start to finish, the home's as-new interior boasts 3 bedrooms (master with walk-in robe & private ensuite) & equally stylish main bathroom. Add to this a light-filled open living/dining area, gourmet kitchen with thick stone bench-tops, stainless steel cooking appliances & dishwasher, walk-in-pantry as well as ample cupboard & bench space.
Other stand-out features of the home include ducted heating & split-system air-conditioning, gleaming porcelain tiles, high ceilings & doors, roomy laundry, single (remote) garage with internal entry, exposed aggregate concreting & excellent storage options throughout.
Step outside to discover a low maintenance landscaped rear garden providing absolute perfection for all first home buyers, downsizers or savvy investors!

Description:
Impeccable Family Living on a Big Fairways Block
In a popular Fairways neighbourhood renowned for its quality homes & impressive family
amenities, this single-level home occupies an exceptionally wide allotment providing a pristine environment of indoor style, outdoor space & terrific Craigieburn convenience.
Absolutely immaculate from start to finish, the home's light-filled interior comprises a large master bedroom with walk-in robe & private ensuite, 2 additional bedrooms (both with built-in robes), spotless central bathroom & separate WC.
Add to this a formal lounge & dining leading through to the versatile open-plan living/meals
area & accompanying kitchen with breakfast bar, tiled splashbacks, gas cooktop & ample
cupboard space, plus ducted heating & split-system air conditioning, large laundry & oversized double garage.
Step outside to appreciate with sheer size of the backyard providing plenty of scope to
landscape, extend, create a sensational al-fresco entertaining area or install a pool - or all of the above!
Walking distance to Fairways' renowned parks & local buses (on Fairways Boulevard), it also
offers easy access to the area's popular shopping centres, childcare & kindergarten facilities, as well as a range of primary & secondary schools.

Great Potential on 650m2 Land!
LJ Hooker Craigieburn is proud to present 4 Pembroke Crescent Craigieburn. Positioned on a massive 650m2 block this home presents the perfect opportunity to secure a great family home. With a little bit of tender love and care needed, this home is ideal for those who like to get their hands dirty. This fantastic home presents a sizeable master bedroom with walk in robe and ensuite, two further bedrooms with built in robes, additional study or fourth bedroom serviced by a central bathroom, massive L-shaped formal lounge and formal dining area with cathedral ceilings, spacious kitchen which overlooks the dining and family area. Outside you can enjoy the spacious pergola area which can also be used as extra storage for cars, boats and trailers with the drive through garage. Fantastic extras include ducted heating, evaporative cooling, ceiling fans, garden shed and more. Perfectly located with public transport, schools and shops all a short distance away, add this to your inspection list and see the potential.

Description:
Right in the heart of Craigieburn!
This modern 2 bedroom townhouse won't last long! This home has NO body corporate. With its prime location & everything at your doorstep! Craigieburn Central Shopping & Restaurant precinct, Splash Aqua Park & Leisure Centre, Schools & public transport all within minutes walking distance!
Only 7 years young!
Great for first home buyers, first time investors, add to your portfolio or anyone wishing to downsize with very little garden maintenance!
Downstairs:-
High 2.7 foot ceilings.
Separate Lounge Room.
Hard wood timber flooring throughout the first floor.
Good size laundry & separate Powder room.
Modern kitchen with stone benchtop, stainless steel appliances; dishwasher, gas cook top, electric oven and robin hood with ample cupboard space & pantry.
Kitchen overlooking the meals/dining area and 2nd living area/lounge room with a glass sliding door taking you outside to the courtyard & garage.
Other highlights;
Under staircase storage
Downlights throughout
Security doors
Flyscreens throughout
Split system - hot/cold
Holland blinds
Smoke Alarms
Garage with Remote control
Upstairs:
Two very large bedrooms share the top floor, all carpeted with built in robes & wall panel heating.
The central bathroom consists of a shower, bath & vanity. Separate toilet, linen cupboard and study/nook area that has natural light filled due to skylight.
This property certainly represents a perfect addition to your investment portfolio or starting out in the rental world!
This first time on the market townhouse won't last long! Be quick to avoid disappointment!

Description:
An Extra Large Family Home on 650m2*
Absolutely perfect for larger/extended families, this one-of-a-kind home stands out from the crowd with its exceptional floorplan flexibility, impressive land size & unbeatable convenience in the very heart of Craigieburn.
Eminently versatile, the home's spotless interior comprises 3 downstairs bedrooms, dedicated study & 3 updated bathrooms, along with a spacious lounge, kitchen/dining area & rear living room. Add to this a further 2 upstairs bedrooms, additional bathroom, living/meals area & second kitchen, as well as its own private entrance.
Other stand-out features include heating & cooling, solid timber floors, large laundry & excellent storage options, plus an outdoor al-fresco style entertaining area, substantial backyard, double garage via side driveway & additional front off-street parking space.
Walking distance to local parks & Cimberwood Drive buses, it's also close to Malcolm Creek trails, choice of shopping centres, primary & secondary schools, as well as easy access to Craigieburn Station & the Hume Freeway.
